delivery.sameSpeed: Same speed for all the phases
delivery.whenWant: When do you want the delivery?
delivery.note: *This is an estimated price for cloud hosting and will vary according to usage.
delivery.builderCouldHelp: Builder Cloud helps you scale your business
delivery.commitmentFreeText: our customers saved over $4.5m, last year.
delivery.multiCloudText: Azure, AWS, and more. Just one bill (for a lot less).
delivery.ourApps: Our apps are designed for the last 3 versions of iOS & Android (at the time your project kicks off). We test on flagship Apple, Samsung & Google devices.
delivery.needTesting: (Need testing for a specific device? Ask your delivery team.)
delivery.forWebApps: For web apps, our testing process covers the last 3 major versions of these browsers:
delivery.essentialMeetings: Essential meeting that kicks off your project. We set everyone's roles, understand your objectives and make sure the app will be exactly how you want it.
delivery.speedyText: We build your app at the speed of light for a premium price
delivery.fastText: We put your app build on turbo charge for a few extra bucks
delivery.standardText: The perfect middle ground for anyone with a modest budget and medium-term deadlines
delivery.slowText: For those with a fixed long-term plan who want to keep costs down
delivery.relaxedText: Our most budget-friendly option for those who aren't in a hurry
